response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. I have a unique product that holds significant value for us both. Given its worth to you, I propose a transaction price of $12,000 for the product. This offer represents a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, ensuring that we both benefit from this exchange. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a seamless and professional transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
